comments:
Build ID: I20070608-1718
CDT used: cdt-master-4.0.0-I200706261300.zip

Steps To Reproduce:
1. create a new C/C++ Project 
   "Makefile project" / "-- other toolchain --"
2. open project properties page
   "C/C++ Build" / "Environment" / "Binary Parsers"
3. disable all binary parsers and press "OK"
4. open project properties page (see step2)
   enable "GNU Elf Parser" and press "OK"
5. open project properties page (see step2)
   disable "GNU Elf Parser" and press "OK"
6. close the project (context menu: "Close Project")
7. reopen the project (context menu: "Open Project")
8. open project properties page (see step2)
9. the list of binary parsers is gone, switching do a different page produces 
   the error:  "The currently displayed page contains invalid values."




More information:
The log says:

2. open project properties page
   "C/C++ Build" / "Settings" / "Binary Parsers"
